talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:TalkPositive_01>Is the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff> ever going to
stop? Seriously...

I've been investigating ruins in intense
daytime heat and freezing cold nights,
and it's done a number on my skin.
I took some time off to go visit the spa...


<snd:Admiration_00>But thanks to the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>, I can't
get to Gerudo Town! This is just...the
worst! <sp:5:0:0>Argh!
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_00>Hmph. <sp:5:0:0>OK.<sp:5:0:0> I'm fine now. Just need to turn
this frown upside down. No wrinkles, just
have to unfurrow my brow...
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Which I'd do, no sweat, if I could just take
advantage of that <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff>! Ugh.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Wait...Gerudo Town isn't in danger...right?
What if Romah was attacked by those weird
monsters from before and is hurt?
No, no...even if she were attacked, monsters like
that wouldn't stand a chance against Romah's
special technique...right?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Shitauchi>I wish the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff> would hurry up
and stop already...

What am I gonna do if my vacation ends
before I can even get to the spa? Argh!

<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_00>Hmph. <sp:5:1:0>OK. I'm fine now. <sp:5:1:0>Just need to turn
this frown upside down. No wrinkles, just
have to unfurrow my brow...
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Which I'd do, no sweat, if I could just take
advantage of that <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff>! Ugh.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:TalkPositive_01>Are you also stuck here thanks to the
<clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>? Ugh, is it ever going to
let up?
I came out here to investigate the ruins
that fell around the Digdogg Bridge...

But this intense daytime heat and the cold
nights have messed with my skin, so I
figured I'd take some time off at the spa.
<snd:Admiration_00>But thanks to the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>, I can't
get to Gerudo Town! This is just...the
worst! Argh!
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_00>Hmph. <sp:5:0:0>OK.<sp:5:0:0> I'm fine now. Just need to turn
this frown upside down. No wrinkles, just
have to unfurrow my brow...
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Which I'd do, no sweat, if I could just take
advantage of that <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff>! Ugh.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I can't believe <clr:0000>Romah's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff> is
already booked solid...

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Admiration_00>At this rate, my vacation's gonna end
without any spa time at all!

<sp:3:0:2:0400>Hmph. <sp:5:0:0>OK.<sp:5:0:0> I'm fine now. Just need to turn
this frown upside down. No wrinkles, just
have to unfurrow my brow...
Which I'd do, no sweat, if I could just take
advantage of that <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff>! Ugh.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Maybe I'll try out the <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff> from her
apprentice, <clr:0000>Olu<clr:ffff>...

But from what I've seen, I get the feeling
she's more likely to get things wrong
than right.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>There's a skilled aesthetician in Gerudo
Town named Romah.

The fluffy beds here are great and all,
but I hear Romah's spa plan is something
else entirely!
Apparently nothing else can make you feel
as relaxed and refreshed as it does!

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Shitauchi>I just want to soothe my poor skin and
bone-tired body! Excavating at Digdogg
Bridge has been exhausting! Argh!
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Hmph. <sp:5:0:0>OK.<sp:5:0:0> I'm fine now. Just need to turn
this frown upside down. No wrinkles, just
have to unfurrow my brow...
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkDeny_01>Oh, are you here to enjoy <clr:0000>Romah's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>spa
plan<clr:ffff> too?

I hear it's booked solid already...


<sp:0:2:2:5000>Even though I set out the moment that sand shroud
died down...<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Admiration_00>This is just...the worst! Argh!


<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Hmph. <sp:5:0:0>OK.<sp:5:0:0> I'm fine now. Just need to turn
this frown upside down. No wrinkles, just
have to unfurrow my brow...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I just want to pamper my skin and body.
Excavating is hard work, and my vacation
is almost over...
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Maybe I'll try out the <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff> from her
apprentice, <clr:0000>Olu<clr:ffff>...

But from what I've seen, I get the feeling
she's more likely to get things wrong
than right.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If I read "Three Big Ideas" one more time,
I'm going to start seeing the pages in
my dreams...
Had I known I'd be stuck waiting this
long, I would have at least brought a real
book. Or a newspaper. Or anything else.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:QuestionNormal>Hey, wait a minute... Does she even offer
her spa plan to men?
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I got here right after the sand shroud died
down, but <clr:0000>Romah's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff> is already
booked solid!
I just want to pamper my skin and body.
Excavating is hard work...

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Admiration_00>And my vacation's almost over! Argh!


<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Hmph. <sp:5:0:0>OK.<sp:5:0:0> I'm fine now. Just need to turn
this frown upside down. No wrinkles, just
have to unfurrow my brow...
Which I'd do, no sweat, if I could just take
advantage of that <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff>! Ugh.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Maybe I'll try out the <clr:0000>spa plan<clr:ffff> from her
apprentice, <clr:0000>Olu<clr:ffff>...

But from what I've seen, I get the feeling
she's more likely to get things wrong
than right.
